name: donatello - Trello inspired clone
description: Donatello is the flexible work management tool where teams can ideate plans and collaborate on projects. Developed with Vue.js, Vuex, SASS, mongoDB, Express and WebSockets.

name: email-app
description: Email app client side project. Developed with Vue.js, Vuex and SASS, and using local storage in order to store the data

name: bitpocket
description: Bitcoin managing app. Developed with React, Redux and SASS, and using local storage in order to store the data

name: minesweeper
description: The good ol' MineSweeper game halloween edition - Vanilla JS Project. Developed using plain HTML, CSS, JS

name: memegen
description: Meme generator - Vanilla JS Project. Developed using plain HTML, CSS, JS

name: missbooks
description: Virtual library, finding books and get inspired by famous quotes. Developed with Angular, RxJS and SASS. Running on serverless backend using firebase tools for authentication and storing data.
